 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָגָב‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Eccl.12.5|Eccl 12:5]]</sup> ==locust, grasshopper== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; compare [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]]), probably a non-flying species, see [[BDB#Kn|Kn]] in [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>[[Lev.11.22|Lev 11:22]]</sup>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶחָגָב‎</span> allowed as food [[Lev.11.22|Lev 11:22]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבֶּה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָלְעָם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַרְגֹּל‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּחֲגָבִיס‎</span> [[Num.13.33|Num 13:33]] ([[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; simile of insignificance), so [[Isa.40.22|Isa 40:22]] as agent of Yahweh's wrath <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָגָב לֶאֱכוֺל חארץ‎</span> [[2Chr.7.13|2Chr 7:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיִסְתַּבֵּל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶחָגָב‎</span> [[Eccl.12.5|Eccl 12:5]] ***and the grasshopper shall be a burden***; better ***shall drag itself along***, [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#RV|RVm]]; [[BDB#De|De]] thinks <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> here figurative of the back part of the pelvic cavity (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***point of hip-bone***, [[BDB#Bo|Bo]], compare [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]), and refers to stiffness of aged joints, so [[BDB#Now|Now]]; but the meaning is dubious; see other views of Comm.
